mapper.select: SELECT DEVICE.DEVID as device_id, DEVICE.DEVNAME as device_name, DEVICE.DEVCLASSID as device_class_id, DEVICEPROPERTY.DVPPROPID as property_id, DEVICEPROPERTY.DVPNAME as property_name, DEVICEPROPERTY.DVPVALUE as property_value, DEVICEPROPERTY.DVPCATEGORY as property_category, DEVICEPROPERTY.DVPRESULTTYPE as property_result_type, PROPERTYFIELD.PRFFIELDID as field_id, PROPERTYFIELD.PRFFIELDNAME as field_name, PROPERTYFIELD.PRFVALUE as field_value, PROPERTYFIELD.PRFCATEGORY as field_category, PROPERTYFIELD.PRFRESULTTYPE as field_result_type, DEVICECOMMAND.DVCCMDID as command_id, DEVICECOMMAND.DVCNAME as command_name, DEVICECOMMAND.DVCVALUE as command_value, DEVICECOMMAND.DVCCATEGORY as command_category, DEVICECOMMAND.DVCRESULTTYPE as command_result_type FROM DEVICE LEFT OUTER JOIN DEVICEPROPERTY ON DEVICE.DEVID = DEVICEPROPERTY.DVPDEVID LEFT OUTER JOIN PROPERTYFIELD ON DEVICE.DEVID = PROPERTYFIELD.PRFDEVID LEFT OUTER JOIN DEVICECOMMAND ON DEVICE.DEVID = DEVICECOMMAND.DVCDEVID

SELECT DEVICE.DEVID as device_id, DEVICE.DEVNAME as device_name, DEVICE.DEVCLASSID as device_class_id, DEVICEPROPERTY.DVPPROPID as property_id, DEVICEPROPERTY.DVPNAME as property_name, DEVICEPROPERTY.DVPVALUE as property_value, DEVICEPROPERTY.DVPCATEGORY as property_category, DEVICEPROPERTY.DVPRESULTTYPE as property_result_type, PROPERTYFIELD.PRFFIELDID as field_id, PROPERTYFIELD.PRFFIELDNAME as field_name, PROPERTYFIELD.PRFVALUE as field_value, PROPERTYFIELD.PRFCATEGORY as field_category, PROPERTYFIELD.PRFRESULTTYPE as field_result_type, DEVICECOMMAND.DVCCMDID as command_id, DEVICECOMMAND.DVCNAME as command_name, DEVICECOMMAND.DVCVALUE as command_value, DEVICECOMMAND.DVCCATEGORY as command_category, DEVICECOMMAND.DVCRESULTTYPE as command_result_type FROM DEVICE LEFT OUTER JOIN DEVICEPROPERTY ON DEVICE.DEVID = DEVICEPROPERTY.DVPDEVID LEFT OUTER JOIN PROPERTYFIELD ON DEVICE.DEVID = PROPERTYFIELD.PRFDEVID LEFT OUTER JOIN DEVICECOMMAND ON DEVICE.DEVID = DEVICECOMMAND.DVCDEVID WHERE DEVICE.DEVID = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO DEVICE (DEVID, DEVNAME, DEVCLASSID) VALUES (#{id}, #{name}, #{deviceClassId})

INSERT INTO PROPERTYFIELD (PRFFIELDID, PRFFIELDNAME, PRFVALUE, PRFCATEGORY, PRFRESULTTYPE, PRFPROPID, PRFDEVID) VALUES (#{field.id}, #{field.name}, #{field.value,javaType=String, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{field.category}, #{field.resultType}, #{propertyId}, #{deviceId})

INSERT INTO DEVICECOMMAND (DVCCMDID, DVCNAME, DVCVALUE, DVCCATEGORY, DVCRESULTTYPE, DVCDEVID) VALUES (#{command.id}, #{command.name}, #{command.value}, #{command.category}, #{command.resultType}, #{id})
